It is a custom here on the AlphaJayShow
to talk about the best and worst

and favorite and least
favorite performances
of the major characters.
This may be a bit more controversial
because I don't have that many characters
that played a big role so just know
that this was a process of elimination.
The best role goes to Vicky.

She did a fantastic job
coming off not only hated

but really hated to make
this special seem important.
The way she was in the beginning,

getting Timmy in trouble
and taking his joy away,
leaving him in misery,

all the way to her antics at
the end really do set her up

to be one of the best antagonists
in the Nicktoon realm.
The worst would have to go to Wanda
only because she didn't do too much.

and also very long character clash

Cosmo is just Cosmo
and Wanda and vice versa.

that they act like one person

and they don't have too many
moments when their thoughts
or actions are different.
The same goes here for Cosmo,

except he was used a
little bit more for comedy.

My favorite performance
however goes to Timmy,

clearly because of his
journey he went through.

Major shout out to the
art styles he went through
and Tara herself.
If she did the different voices

during the phase where
Timmy was getting older,
she deserves all of the props
for a marvelous performance.
My least favorite however would be a tie
between Timmy's Dad and Older Timmy.
Timmy's Dad was also a comic relief
but he was severely lacking

and because he didn't have
enough time to redeem himself

but enough time to establish
himself as a major character,
he kind of goes in this spot.
Older Timmy because he was kind of dull,
from the voice acting to the design.

This could have easily been
passed off as a side character
if it wasn't so minutely stylized.

You can tell its older
Timmy but that's about it.

I'd would much rather
prefer the all good brother
Timmy had in that one episode.
Overall, Channel Chasers is really good
to watch however like with Wishology,
it does feel like they stall for time

but instead of having a lot
of characters to deal with,

they have this gimmick of
different shows to parody.

I love how Timmy was
throughout the whole ordeal.

Tootie played an underrated
gem in this TV movie.

For the most part the parodies
were at least above average,

or I guess decent enough,
but this isn't perfect.

I would say I like this
more than Wishology

but Wishology was much
better, even with more time.
